en.name: Sequence of Solitude
en.passiveDescription: When an attack hits an opponent, deal AoE DMG equal to {{40//50//60//70//80%}} of Max HP at the target location. This effect can be triggered once every 15s.

zh.name: 冷寂迸音
zh.passiveDescription: 攻击命中敌人时，在目标位置基于生命值上限的{{40//50//60//70//80%}}，造成范围伤害。该效果每15秒至多触发一次。
